body_html: Is there any way for us to ensure that we link against a library that matches the header? Is there a function you can use to ask cuDNN for a version and compare that to what you compiled with?

body: Is there any way for us to ensure that we link against a library that matches the header? Is there a function you can use to ask cuDNN for a version and compare that to what you compiled with?
